alert.note: Alert for Broome; Cortland; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Broome, southwestern Cortland, northeastern Tioga and east central Tompkins Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lisle, or near Marathon, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Berkshire, Richford, Harford, Marathon, Lapeer, Lisle, Hunts Corners, Freetown Corners and Center Lisle. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 near 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
